price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߘߍ߬ߡߍ߲߬ߠߌ߲߬ ߟߊߣߐ߬ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߕߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߖߘߍ߬ ߡߊߘߍ߬ߡߍ߲߬ ߠߊ߫؟
arabic: وَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ لَهُمۡ نَصۡرٗا وَلَآ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَنصُرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walā yastaṭīʿūna lahum naṣran walā anfusahum yanṣurūna
